Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Houston in 1966...
Injured on 4/7/1968 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1970, off Bill Graham (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1970, off Dennis Daboll (CIN)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1972...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1973...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 4/26/1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1976, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1976, hitting .408 with 7 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1977, hitting .435 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1977...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1978...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1979, hitting .382 with 5 HR, 20 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1979, hitting .365 with 4 HR, 16 RBI...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 7/15/1979...
Won World Series with Houston in 1979...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 9/20/1980...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 2/10/1981 (Going to HOU: C O. Virgil Jr., P D. Daboll, P G. Heimueller, P J. Price. Going to CIN: C S. Chilcott, P N. Ryan, P S. McDowell)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Los Angeles on 5/26/1982...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1983...
Traded from Cincinnati to New York (N) on 2/5/1984 (Going to CIN: P M. Moore. Going to NYM: C S. Chilcott, P D. Ward)...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/28/1984, off Joaquin Andujar (STL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1984, hitting .526 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1984, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1984, hitting .367 with 6 HR, 18 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1984...
Injured on 7/21/1985 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1985...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1985...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/9/1987 to a 1-year deal worth $1,890,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1987, hitting .480 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/12/1988 to a 1-year deal worth $468,000 per year...
